name: MinIO
short_description: High Performance Object Storage compatible with Amazon S3 API.
description: High Performance Object Storage compatible with Amazon S3 API. MinIO is a self-hosted application focused on utility, tools, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host MinIO on your home server to high performance object storage compatible with amazon s3 api without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use MinIO to manage your utility workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
